text: The flag of Andalusia () has three horizontal stripes of green, white and green with the coat of arms of Andalusia. It was adopted 4 May 2021. == Other flags == File:Flag of Andalucía (no CoA).svg|Common civil flag variant without the coat of arms File:Bandera Andalucía Libre.svg|Left nationalist and pro-independence flag, used by Nación Andaluza and other groups File:Andnac3.svg|Another nationalist flag using traditional Tartessos 8-point star File:Andnac2.svg|Flag of the Andalucista Youth (Andalusian Party youth wing) ==References== Andalusia Andalusia
title: Flag of Andalusia
